Coaching available

Explore coaching options

Whether you're just starting your tennis journey or looking to sharpen your skills, we've got something for both Adults and Juniors. Join us for coaching, tailored to all ages and abilities.

Coaching options

LTA Youth - Blue/Red

This is an introduction to tennis. Here, we’ll help kids improve their balance, agility and co-ordination while teaching them about the sport we love. At this stage it’s not about winning or losing, it’s just getting to grips with the basics.

Date: Sat, Mar 01 - Sat, 12 Apr 2025

Time: 09:00 - 10:00

Age: 4-7 years old

LTA Youth - Red/Orange

This will look a bit more like the tennis you know. You’ll see overarm serves, rallies and volleys. Coaches will help children to further develop their co-ordination, balance and speed. We’ll introduce relaxed competition here too.

Date: Sat, Mar 01 - Sat, 12 Apr 2025

Time: 10:00 - 11:00

Age: 6-10 years old

LTA Youth - Orange/Green

Time to throw in some tactics, problem-solving, and guides to sportsmanship and leadership. At this stage children will know all of the rules and will be serving and returning in matches.

Date: Sat, Mar 01 - Sat, 12 Apr 2025

Time: 11:00 - 12:00

Age: 8-15 years old

LTA Cardio Tennis

Cardio Tennis is a high energy group fitness session that combines music and tennis with cardiovascular exercise. Delivering the ultimate full body workout, Cardio Tennis is fun, social and designed to get you moving.

Date: Mon, Mar 03 - Mon, 10 Mar 2025

Time: 19:00 - 20:00

Age: All
